results.title: ‘Transgender’ Could Be Defined Out of Existence Under Trump Administration
results.abstract: The Trump administration is considering a legal definition of gender as immutable and fixed at birth, the most drastic in a series of moves against transgender people.
results.byline: By ERICA L. GREEN, KATIE BENNER and ROBERT PEAR

multimedia.caption: People protesting the Trump administration’s policies toward gender and gay rights in New York last year.
People protesting the Trump administration’s policies toward gender and gay rights in New York last year.
People protesting the Trump administration’s policies toward gender and gay rights in New York last year.

results.title: Turkey’s President Vows to Detail Khashoggi Death ‘in Full Nakedness’
results.abstract: In taking on the Saudis over Jamal Khashoggi’s death, President Recep Tayyip Erdogan may be fighting a larger, geopolitical battle.

multimedia.caption: President Recep Tayyip Erdogan of Turkey greeting members of Parliament in Ankara last week.
President Recep Tayyip Erdogan of Turkey greeting members of Parliament in Ankara last week.

results.title: Saudis’ Image Makers: A Troll Army and a Twitter Insider
results.abstract: The kingdom silences dissent online by sending operatives to swarm critics. It also recruited a Twitter employee suspected of spying on users, interviews show.
results.byline: By KATIE BENNER, MARK MAZZETTI, BEN HUBBARD and MIKE ISAAC

multimedia.caption: Online attackers who targeted Jamal Khashoggi were part of a broad effort ordered by Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman and his close advisers to silence Saudi critics.
Online attackers who targeted Jamal Khashoggi were part of a broad effort ordered by Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman and his close advisers to silence Saudi critics.

results.title: Bipartisan Chorus Calls for Punishing Saudis as Trump Accuses Them of ‘Deception’
results.abstract: Saudi Arabia’s account of the death of Jamal Khashoggi has been “all over the place,” President Trump told The Washington Post. His response has likewise changed day by day.
results.byline: By MARK LANDLER and SHERYL GAY STOLBERG

multimedia.caption: “Obviously, there’s been deception and there’s been lies,” President Trump said of Saudi Arabia.
“Obviously, there’s been deception and there’s been lies,” President Trump said of Saudi Arabia.
“Obviously, there’s been deception and there’s been lies,” President Trump said of Saudi Arabia.
